attributes.action: limit the amount of hair gel Cristiano Ronaldo is allowed to put in his hair before a game of football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On grounds of health and saftey, players eyes are very important and a wayward speck of gel could damage an unsuspecting opponents eyesight. Plus it looks stupid.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
